attributes.action: Scrap all charges for Health & Safety made by councils and police authorities and let rememberance day parades continue to be  held.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The men&women of this once Great country gave their lives freely.Now their comrades are being charged for parades to remember them.Disgusting.About time this country put the Great back in it.Least we forget.Drop all charges for these parades.
